formName: TSP request for access to CHIEF

sections.title: Business details
sections.description: These must match the details you provided for your Transitional Simplified Procedures registration.

fields.label: UK EORI reference
fields.helpText: This is GB followed by 12 numbers, for example GB123456789123.

fields.label: Business or trading name
fields.helpText: This must match the name or trading name as registered with EORI.

sections.title: Enter the details of the person filling in this form
sections.description: HMRC will use these details if we need to discuss this form. Find more information in the HMRC privacy policy on this page.

fields.label: Telephone number
fields.helpText: For international numbers include the country code.

fields.label: Email address
fields.helpText: We will also use this to send you a confirmation email.

sections.title: How do you want to make declarations in CHIEF?

fields.label: How do you want to make declarations in CHIEF?
optionHelpText: After you complete this form, you will also need to request an entry data capture service (EDCS) role & location to be able to submit supplementary declarations. You can do this here: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/import-and-export-trade-request-for-chief-access-via-wex-channels-pa7

sections.title: Do you already have a  DTI badge you want to activate for CHIEF?

fields.label: Do you already have a DTI badge you want to activate for CHIEF?
choices: Yes, I already have the badge I want to activate
No, I need a new badge

sections.title: Which Community Service Provider (CSP) issued your DTI badge?

fields.label: Which Community Service Provider (CSP) issued your DTI badge?
What is a CSP?
fields.infoText: CHIEF connects with 5 Community System Providers (CSPs). These are independent trade systems that directly serve hundreds of carriers, transit sheds and freight forwarders. CSPs record and track the movement of goods within ports, enabling them to operate more efficiently. that allows you to make declarations in CHIEF and can be obtained from a community system provider (CSP)

sections.title: What email address do you want to set up to submit your CHIEF declarations?

fields.label: What email address do you want to set up to submit your CHIEF declarations?
fields.helpText: We will only use this to set up your email badge.

choices: I confirm that the information in this form is true, complete and accurate.

fields.infoText:
This is your last opportunity to print or save a PDF copy of your submitted form.

We have received your request to access CHIEF for Transitional Simplified Procedures.

You can expect to receive a response within XX days

For further information see the [TSP guidance page](https://www.gov.uk/guidance/register-for-simplified-import-procedures-if-the-uk-leaves-the-eu-without-a-deal).
